poster: S E X Y B O I
title: Why doesn't Doran's shield's passive stack?
body:
Every role except tanks can benefit from more than 1 Doran's item. Make tanks feel like tanks and let passive stack ffs. Even the ring has a passive that stacks. And as for the shield, there's no reason not to buy a Ruby Crystal over a second one.
If i was Garen and died early in lane, had a poke lane or something similar, another shield would be great. But for the love of god, why would anyone let tanks be tanky? What evil and twisted person would want to do something like that??

replies.body: The problem behind it is basically a support going bot lane and having 2-3 of these and becoming more or less unkillable to an opposing ADC at the lower levels.
